item.text: The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standard for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended the next few questions to measure prior treatments, disability and goals. This section takes about 2 minutes.

code.display: Do you feel there is a relationship between your back pain and any of the following?

item.text: Do you feel there is a relationship between your back pain and any of the following?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: Are you involved in a lawsuit or legal claim related to you back problem?

item.text: Are you involved in a lawsuit or legal claim related to you back problem?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: How much have you been bothered by stomach pain?

item.text: How much have you been bothered by stomach pain?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: How much have you been bothered by headaches?

item.text: How much have you been bothered by headaches?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: How much have you been bothered by pain the joints in your arms or legs?

item.text: How much have you been bothered by pain the joints in your arms or legs?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: how much have you been bothered by widespread pain or pain in most of your body?

item.text: how much have you been bothered by widespread pain or pain in most of your body?
The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: It's not really safe for a person with my back pain to be physically active.

item.text: It's not really safe for a person with my back pain to be physically active.
item.prefix: Do you agree or disagree with this statement:

item.text: The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

code.display: I feel that my back pain is terrible and it's never going to get any better.

item.text: I feel that my back pain is terrible and it's never going to get any better.
item.prefix: Do you agree or disagree with this statement:

item.text: The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.
What is your treatment goal?

valueCoding.display: Become pain-free all of the time
Reduce pain enough so I can function

item.text: The National Institutes of Health Task Force on Research Standards for Chronic Low Back Pain recommended this question as part of the minimum data set for back pain.

valueExpression.name: any_questions_answered
valueExpression.expression: %bi1_value.exists() or %bi2_value.exists() or %bi3_value.exists() or %bi4_value.exists() or %bi5_value.exists() or %bi6_value.exists() or %bi7_value.exists() or %bi8_value.exists() or %bi9_value.exists()

iif(%any_questions_answered, iif(%bi1_value.exists(), %bi1_value, 0) + iif(%bi2_value.exists(), %bi2_value, 0) + iif(%bi3_value.exists(), %bi3_value, 0) + iif(%bi4_value.exists(), %bi4_value, 0) + iif(%bi5_value.exists(), %bi5_value, 0) + iif(%bi6_value.exists(), %bi6_value, 0) + iif(%bi7_value.exists(), %bi7_value, 0) + iif(%bi8_value.exists(), %bi8_value, 0) + iif(%bi9_value.exists(), %bi9_value, 0), {})

item.text: Back Pain Impact Score
